code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:M aged 46 years presents with moderate lethargy, severe frequent urination, moderate parethesia in lower limbs and Diabetes. These symptoms are present for about 9 days. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 75 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:administered insulin aspart - 100 mg/mL subcutaneous daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:pt with moderate parethesia in lower limbs, moderate lethargy and severe frequent urination. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years. he is a white M aged 47 Ys. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 75 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=30 mg/dL,creatinine=2 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,HCO3=17 meq/L, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:administered insulin aspart - 100 mg/mL subcutaneous daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
